title: Time for Lime
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Budget bungalows, cooking school, bar, and restaurant on the southern end of Klong Dao beach. Changing food items and a course tasting menu are available with vegetarian choices; last order 9:30pm. Free Wi-Fi. Could take vegetarian cooking class (specify when booking). Profits goes to Lanta Animal Welfare, a cat and dog rescue clinic in the island established by the owner.
